profile:
We Design, Construct and Maintain outdoor spaces that leave you breathless.

We are Ontario's leading landscaping and construction company, based in Toronto. We pride ourselves in providing professional, accurate and friendly service. We always assure 100% satisfaction to every customer, with quality work that lasts - for years and years of enjoyment.

We will help you with individual design ideas, materials, location recommendations & anything else needed, to get your landscaping project started.

All work is performed in an ethical and patient - yet timely - manner. And the quality is proudly guaranteed for up to 5 years.

profile:
Outdoor Lighting Perspectives is the world's largest full-service outdoor lighting company, and we are proud to have our fixtures enjoyed at more than 150,000+ homes across North America. 

Whatever your outdoor lighting needs, we have the experience and expertise to get it done right the first time.

WHAT WE DO:

We want to transform your outdoor living spaces in the best way possible. Some of our exquisite outdoor lighting options include:

-Accent lighting to subtly show off your property’s best features
-Architectural lighting to highlight your home’s unique beauty
-Pool lighting to keep your nightly swims safe
-Patio and deck lights to add excitement to your nighttime entertaining
-Garden lighting to accentuate your stunning landscaping
-Path lighting to guide your guests where they need to go
-Up-lighting for home facade, trees, and outdoor artwork

From a single small garden that needs just a touch of light, to a sprawling estate home that needs lighting with zone control automation, we offer it all.

Call us today for a free at-home consultation, and one of our lighting designers will make a customs lighting design for your unique property.

WHAT MAKES US DIFFERENT:

We are dedicated outdoor lighting designers and installers. We do one thing, and we do it the best. We aren't a sprinkler company or lawn care company moonlighting in outdoor lights when times are slow. We will be here to take the call when your lights need maintenance years down the road.

We manufacture our lights by hand, mostly in the United States but some right here in Toronto, so we can control the entire chain of quality from raw materials to your beautiful garden. 

Our designers, installers, and service crews are all our own staff: we do not use sub-contractors. With Outdoor Lighting Perspectives, your satisfaction is guaranteed in writing and backed by our 30 year on-site warranty.

THE TRUSTWORTHY CHOICE:

How can you find an outdoor lighting contractor you can trust to get the work done right, on time, and safely? 

We have been independently vetted by a third-party for our complete and up-to-date liability insurance and workers compensation coverage, our safety and training compliance, and our long established track record of happy customer referrals and testimonials. 

Companies claiming to do lighting come and go, but we're celebrating 20 years and our warranty is backed by our international network of 60+ locations. We'll install your lights today, but we'll also maintain them for years to come.

THE NEXT STEP:

We offer free design consultations and free quotes. Please contact us to discuss your outdoor lighting needs and how we can be of assistance.

profile:
Ontario Green Irrigation is the company to service your irrigation needs in the GTA and the surrounding areas. Our mission is to beautify residential properties through quality lawn and shrub irrigation.
At Ontario Green Irrigation, we take pride in serving our customers. It's our desire to exceed your expectations in every way. We’d love to hear from you anytime. Contact us by phone or complete our online form and someone will be in touch with you to answer any questions or hear any suggestions you might have. 
We build irrigation systems that conserve water and automate the process of caring for lawns. Very little needs to be done on the part of our clients to achieve a healthy landscape. We coordinate with the town, take all necessary measurements and arrange for a licensed plumber to complete the hook-up with your plumbing system. Our state of the art equipment allows us to be efficient and available at all times. It also allows us to spend more time getting to know the needs of each particular lawn and customize the system accordingly.  
We are trained and experienced professional irrigation contractors with a history of customer satisfaction in both system installation and service We will select the right Rain Bird products for the unique needs of your landscape, program your controlled to operate at maximum efficiency, and instruct you on how to adjust your system's watering schedule to meet seasonal requirements.
service_area: Brampton, Mississauga, Etobicoke, North York, King City, Nobleton, Gormley, Markham, Vaughan, Toronto, GTA,
products:
We carry full lines of the most popular and good qualtiy sprinkler brands of Rotors, Spray heads, Electric Valves, Controllers, Drip Irrigation, Rain Sensors, etc. As a Rainbird Select Contractor we will install quality irrigation systems with genuine Rain Bird products.
Ontario Green Irrigation proudly uses almost exclusively Hunter and Rainbird Irrigation Products. Hunter and Rainbird products are known as the "Cadillac" of the industry and include a complete lines of sprinklers, rotary heads, shrub heads, valves, controllers (timers) and a variety of accessory products, including rain sensors. Many Hunter and Rainbird products are guaranteed for up to 5 years and can be replaced for labor costs only in the event of failure.
Rotary Sprinkler Rotor-type sprinklers have one or more moving streams of water that rotate around the sprinkler head.
Spray Sprinkler Spray-type sprinklers spray a fan of water out of the nozzle, similar to a shower head.
Valves Electric solenoid valves used for turning on irrigation circuits (sprinklers or drip emitters.) Includes anti-siphon, angle, and globe type valves.
Controllers Controllers are fancy timers used to turn on and off automatic valves.
services:
REPAIR ALL BRANDS OF LAWN SPRINKLERS QUICKLY AND PROPERLY.
Our service techs are experienced and well-trained, and our service trucks are equipped with the latest troubleshooting equipment which allows us to quickly diagnose, troubleshoot, and properly repair all brands of sprinkler systems.
RE-ROUTING A SPRINKLER SYSTEM during swimming pool construction is no problem for Fellows Irrigation. We will cap off existing irrigation to permit usage of lawn sprinklers in areas not affected by construction, then re-route sprinklers around pool as needed to maintain a beautiful backyard.
INSTALL NEW LAWN SPRINKLERS SYSTEM - Ontario Green Irrigation will custom-design and install your system to give the most efficient, cost effective lawn sprinkler possible. Zone landscape areas to water according to watering needs. Landscape areas in full shade (between houses, for example) need less water than full sun areas. Proper zoning of your system will cost more to install but save you money in the future as well as save our most precious resource - water!
QUALITY PRODUCTS COMBINED WITH SKILLED SERVICE TECHS is what Ontario Green Irrigation is about and what will make you a satisfied customer.
brands: As a Rainbird Select Contractor we will install quality irrigation systems with genuine Rain Bird products.

profile:
Filedmasters Synthetic Grass is second to none in the synthetic turf industry. Since 1991 we have provided the Canadian market with high-quality artificial turf products that are ideal for putting or golf greens, playgrounds, landscaping and more. 

Due to increasing water shortages and environmental concerns regarding chemicals and lawn fertilizers, more homeowners, business owners, and city governments are opting to install our products. Our synthetic grass eliminates the need for constant maintenance such as irrigation, mowing, fertilizing, aerating and more.

Fieldmasters products are durable, versatile, safe, economical and 100% recyclable. Most importantly, they look and feel so much like real natural sod that they enhance the look of any residential or commercial landscape. We are proud to offer our clients a high-quality product that will stand the test of time.

We also offer ull landscape and design for residential, recreational and commercial properties.

Residential: Grass replacement (back yard, front yard, balconies, roof tops), pool deck covering, interlocking patios, retaining walls, fencing, path ways and flag stones. 

Recreational: Sports fields such as soccer, football, lacrosse and lawn bowling.

Commercial: Day cares, community centers,  dog kennels, dog spas, gold centers, fitness centers.

....and many more!

- We are proudly Canadian
- We are located in GTA, in turn can provide quick response as required
- Proven success various of installation (installers are certified)
- Our product is North American made from one of the largest artificial turf manufacturer in the world. They are leaders in manufacturing artificial turf for various uses, industries and geographic locations
- We’ve been in business for 25+ years.
- Our turf is technologically advanced synthetic turf system that is engineered for durability, performance, and appearance
- Our backing is a premium design/quality, resulting in better drainage, better suited for pet management and weed prevention
- Our product is 100% made from new materials, no part of the turf is recycled or has been used previously
- Our product is 100% recyclable, heaven forbid you wanted to remove it
- Our product is 100% lead free and fire tested (have certifications to prove it)
- Our product doesn’t attract insects, animals won’t eat it, weed will not grow through it,  it’s allergen-free, and accidents wash right through
- Our product is designed to deter against various elements: high human and non-human traffic, heavy rain, heavy snow, high winds, high sun
- 10 year limited warranty
- Fully insured and WSIB
- Many references (see the pictures for a small sample of what we have accomplished)
name: Fieldmasters Synthetic Grass & Landscape Design

profile:
Welcome TC Contracting 

We offer many Services:

Retaining walls: TC Contracting are specialist in Armour stone, interlock and Pre cast concrete retaining walls.  Whether its aesthetic, or structural  needs, TC Contracting has the skills and knowledge to complete the task. Contact us with your ideas and watch us bring them to reality. 

Full Landscaping , Interlock, Concrete: We know you work hard to see your dream property come to reality. Here at TC, we will work with you to make sure the job is done properly and in a timely matter

Fencing: To dig and set post to complete fencing jobs. From 10 feet to a 1000 feet .  TC has the capabilities to finish your project. Many different fencing designs available, contact us to get started 
Decks: There are many options when it comes to decks IE: Wood type, railings, Steps, Levels ECT. Let TC Contracting's team help you figure out which options are suited best for you!  

Excavation and Trenching: Are you looking for a trusted contractor to excavate your next  project? There are many laws and regulations surrounding excavating and digging. Let us explain what needs to be done and leave it with TC so you are confident  that your job is being done right.  Each and every time!

Gravel Driveways and Sodding: Looking to give your property a beautiful new look? TC Contracting are experts at gravel driveways and sod. We work with our partners to guarantee the best materials at the best prices.
name: TC contracting

profile:
Have you worked with landscaping contractors before who rush through the job and leave a mess of your yard? Do you now struggle to trust someone to take care of your lawn?

We’re a team of dedicated landscaping professionals who are well-known for getting any landscaping project done right, the first time around. We’re passionate about helping homeowners and business owners reach their landscaping goals and we take pride in our ability to provide high-quality services at an affordable price.
Since opening our doors in 2018, we’ve been able to expand our service areas all thanks to our trusted customers who rely on us as their long-term landscaping partner. If you live in Rockwood, Guelph, or the KW area, give us a call or request a free quote to discuss all your landscaping needs and how we can help you accomplish them.

We offer services such as:
Design
Build
Maintenance
Snow Removal

And more!

Check us out here:

www.instagram.com/riverwood_landscape
https://www.facebook.com/RiverwoodLandscape/

Unique Hardscapes is a full service landscape design and build company based out of Halton Hills.
We pride ourselves on creating beautiful outdoor living spaces while creating a uniquely memorable and fun experience for our customers.

We love what we do and want you to be as excited with the process as you will be with the final product. 
From first meeting to design and project completion we will walk you through the process and keep you involved in the excitement. Everyone has their own style and we love the challenge of creating functional yet beautiful spaces that fit your style and budget.
